DataElement.preferredName: Human Papilloma Virus Vaccine Person Child Administered Vaccination Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the vaccination status of a person's child having a human papilloma virus vaccine administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Human Papilloma Virus Vaccine Person Child Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A recombinant vaccine of different types of HPV proteins which are well-conserved within types with a significant inter-type variation.:A human being._An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A recombinant vaccine of different types of HPV proteins which are well-conserved within types with a significant inter-type variation.

Concepts.definition: A recombinant vaccine of different types of HPV proteins which are well-conserved within types with a significant inter-type variation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A human being._An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A human being.
An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Active immunization where vaccine is administered for therapeutic or preventive purposes. This can include administration of immunopotentiating agents such as BCG vaccine and Corynebacterium parvum as well as biological response modifiers such as interferons, interleukins, and colony-stimulating factors in order to directly stimulate the immune system.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Administration of vaccines to stimulate the host's immune response. This includes any preparation intended for active immunological prophylaxis or treatment._A condition or state at a particular time.

PermissibleValues.value: I took my child or children for the HPV vaccine before they were 18

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Child Prior Eighteen Taken Human Papilloma Virus Vaccine
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._Earlier in time or order._A natural number greater than seventeen and less than nineteen and the quantity that it denotes._Having been accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication._A recombinant vaccine of different types of HPV proteins which are well-conserved within types with a significant inter-type variation.
